vlive.korean: [울와 엄귀력에 울다가 지구 침수죄 선고받았거든] 안 괜찮아! [Because I'm crying a lot since TWICE members are so cute] It's not okay! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TWICE] 울와가! 세글자! 게임을! 하는데! 눈이 와..!❄️ (TWICE playing 3 letters game)
vlive.english: [Because I'm crying a lot since TWICE members are so cute] It's not okay!

vlive.korean: 육째들 천사예요! 사망선고가 아니고! It is! Not a death sentence. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 대한민국 3대 기름 역시 참기름 들기름 그리고 윤.기.(름) (Woong's drawing time)
vlive.english: It is! Not a death sentence.

vlive.korean: [ABNEW] "순살치킨들 사망선고" 아니에요! 천사예요! [ABNEW] "Boneless chicken, death sentence". No, it is an angel. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 대한민국 3대 기름 역시 참기름 들기름 그리고 윤.기.(름) (Woong's drawing time)
vlive.english: [ABNEW] "Boneless chicken, death sentence". No, it is an angel.

vlive.korean: [젤리 선고 임박] 강다니엘은 다시 젤리를 먹어도 됩니까? [Soon the jelly diagnosis will be announced] Is it okay for Kang Daniel to eat jelly again? 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 33회 - 존재 자체가 선물인 분들.. 워너원이 왔습니다★
vlive.english: [Soon the jelly diagnosis will be announced] Is it okay for Kang Daniel to eat jelly again?

vlive.korean: [강다니엘 금젤 선고 현장] - 치과 전문의를 모셨습니다 - 진짜요? [The day Kang Daniel was banned from eating jelly] - if you can eat jelly or not. - Really? 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 33회 - 존재 자체가 선물인 분들.. 워너원이 왔습니다★
vlive.english: [The day Kang Daniel was banned from eating jelly] - if you can eat jelly or not. - Really?

examples.korean: He was sentenced to death by electrocution. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 전기 처형형을 선고받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was sentenced to death by electrocution. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was convicted at a court martial. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 군법회의에서 유죄 선고를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was convicted at a court martial. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was found guilty of embezzling $150000 of public funds. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 공금 15만 달러를 횡령한 것으로 유죄 선고를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was found guilty of embezzling $150000 of public funds. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Criminals could at one time be sentenced to penal servitude. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 과거에는 범죄자들이 강제노역형을 선고받을 수도 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Criminals could at one time be sentenced to penal servitude. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The victim’s widow protested at the leniency of the sentence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 피해자의 아내가 그 가벼운 선고 내용에 이의를 제기했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The victim’s widow protested at the leniency of the sentence. Add to Wordbook
